text: The Big Fix is a 1978 American political comedy thriller movie directed by Jeremy Kagan and was based on the novel by Roger L. Simon. It stars Richard Dreyfuss, John Lithgow, Susan Anspach, F. Murray Abraham, Fritz Weaver and Ron Rifkin and was distributed by Universal Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1978 comedy-drama movies Category:1978 thriller movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies set in Los Angeles Category:Movies directed by Jeremy Kagan Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:1970s English-language movies Category:1970s American drama movies Category:Political movies
title: The Big Fix (1978 movie)
